title: Getting taught a lesson - what did you learn
body:
Every time a troll in my team tries to teach someone else on my team a lesson by feeding, AFK farming, AFKing, I am at a loss as to what the troll was trying to teach me.

What have you learned from trolls who feed, AFK farm, or afk?

replies.body: It taught me that small man syndrome is real.

I thought a trolls sole objective was to "Ruin everyone else's game because they ruined mine by not leashing"

Since when do trolls teach lessons xD
since 90% of them say "im doing this to teach you a lesson"

That we must all cower in fear below them. 
They have power of the Rift and its denizens.
Their unstoppable whining march will drown out Riot's reports.
i teach you not to disrespect me, if you do you lose and i don't care if i lose so i win either way
it taught me that whenever something goes wrong its not my fault anyway better blame team
